sentence.Network_en: It was a sad finale to an otherwise spectacular career.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于一段一直辉煌的职业生涯来说，这是一个惨淡的收官。

sentence.Network_en: The finale had 50,000 adults standing in open-mouthed wonderment.
sentence.Network_cn: 终场一幕让50,000名成年观众惊叹得张大嘴站了起来。

sentence.Network_en: the rousing finale of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony
sentence.Network_cn: 贝多芬第九交响曲激动人心的末乐章

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Italian, from Latin finalis (see final)

entry.tran: (演出的)终场，最后一幕;(音乐的)终曲，末乐章;(一系列演出)最后一场
entry.def: The finale of a show, piece of music, or series of shows is the last part of it or the last one of them, especially when this is exciting or impressive.

example.ex: ... the finale of Shostakovich's Fifth Symphony...
example.tran: 肖斯塔科维奇第五交响曲的末乐章

example.ex: Tonight's light show is the grand finale of a month-long series of events.
example.tran: 今晚的灯光秀是为期1个月的系列活动的盛大收场。

entry.def: If you say that an event provides a particular kind of finale to something, you mean that it provides it with a particular kind of ending.

example.ex: ...the dramatic finale to America's seven-year hostage crisis...
example.tran: 历时7年的美国人质危机的戏剧性结局

example.ex: It was a sad finale to an otherwise spectacular career.
example.tran: 对于一段一直辉煌的职业生涯来说，这是一个惨淡的收官。

means.word_mean: 1. the temporal end; the concluding time;

sentences.sentence: "the stopping point of each round was signaled by a bell"
"the market was up at the finish"
"they were playing better at the close of the season"

means.word_mean: 2. the closing section of a musical composition
3. the concluding part of any performance

auth_sentence.content: The marathon was the perfect finale to it all.

auth_sentence.content: It seems an odd finale given Herbert's age.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

sentences.en: The evening ended with a grand finale of fireworks and music.
sentences.cn: 晚会在烟花和音乐声中隆重收场了。

sentences.en: The match had a thrilling finale, with three goals scored in the last five minutes.
sentences.cn: 比赛结尾非常精彩，最后5 分钟连进3 球。

sentences.en: This victory provided a fitting finale to a brilliant season for the club.
sentences.cn: 这次胜利给俱乐部辉煌的赛季画上了圆满的句号。
